author: tocheng
body:
#### PR description:

The PR is to update the MC GTs in autoCond

#### **Run-1 MC**
No difference between GTs in PR and GTs in master branch.
Diff
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/106X_mcRun1_design_v1
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/106X_mcRun1_realistic_v1/105X_mcRun1_realistic_v1
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/106X_mcRun1_HeavyIon_v1/105X_mcRun1_HeavyIon_v1
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/106X_mcRun1_pA_v1/105X_mcRun1_pA_v1

#### **2015 MC**
No difference between GTs in PR and GTs in master branch except difference in 2015 simulation due to HLT PF calibration
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/106X_mcRun2_startup_v1/105X_mcRun2_startup_v1
Diff
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/106X_mcRun2_asymptotic_l1stage1_v1/105X_mcRun2_asymptotic_l1stage1_v2
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/106X_mcRun1_HeavyIon_v1/105X_mcRun1_HeavyIon_v1
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/106X_mcRun1_pA_v1/105X_mcRun1_pA_v1
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/106X_mcRun2_HeavyIon_v1/105X_mcRun2_HeavyIon_v2

#### **2016 MC**
No difference in 2016 simulation as the latest JEC/JER is already in
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/106X_mcRun2_asymptotic_v2/105X_mcRun2_asymptotic_v4
**ECAL ideal condition update**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/106X_mcRun2_design_v2/105X_mcRun2_design_v3

No difference in cosmic GTs
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/106X_mcRun2cosmics_startup_deco_v1/105X_mcRun2cosmics_startup_deco_v4

#### **2017 MC**
Differences are due to **JEC/JER update**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/106X_mc2017_realistic_v2/106X_mc2017_realistic_v1
**ECAL ideal condition update**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/106X_mc2017_design_IdealBS_v3/106X_mc2017_design_IdealBS_v2

Cosmic GTs stay unchanged

#### **2018 MC**
Differences are due to **JEC/JER update**+**Tracker mis-alignment scenario**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/106X_upgrade2018_realistic_v3/106X_upgrade2018_realistic_v1
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/106X_upgrade2018_realistic_HEfail_v3/106X_upgrade2018_realistic_HEfail_v1
Differences are due to **Tracker mis-alignment scenario**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/106X_upgrade2018cosmics_realistic_deco_v2/106X_upgrade2018cosmics_realistic_deco_v1
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/106X_upgrade2018cosmics_realistic_peak_v2/106X_upgrade2018cosmics_realistic_peak_v1

**ECAL ideal condition update**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/106X_upgrade2018_design_v2/106X_upgrade2018_design_v1

Heavy Ion GTs stay unchanged

#### **Run-3 MC**
Differences are due to **Pixel quality for Run-3**+**HCAL eMap and L1 object update**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/106X_postLS2_design_v3/106X_postLS2_design_v1
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/106X_postLS2_realistic_v3/106X_postLS2_realistic_v1

#### **Phase-2 MC**
Differences are due to **Phase-2 tracker DTC eMap**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/106X_upgrade2023_realistic_v1/105X_upgrade2023_realistic_v5

#### PR validation:

The updates are motivated by

1)JEC/JER update : see [JEC/JER twiki](https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/viewauth/CMS/JECDataMC)
2)Tracker mis-alignment scenario for 2018 : see [hn announcement](https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/4112.html)
3) ECAL design condition updates for 2016-2018 : see [hn announcement](https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/4115.html)
4) Pixel quality for Run-3 : see [hn announcement](https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/4116.html)
5) HCAL eMap and L1 object update for Run-3 (and MWGR analysis) : see [hn announcement](https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/4113.html)
6) Phase-2 tracker DTC eMap : see [hn announcement](https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/4111.html)

runTheMatrix test is performed.
title: Update MC GTs in 106X
